column1: Calimete is a municipality and town in the Matanzas Province of Cuba. It was founded in 1867 by José Antonio Castañeda.

column2: the municipality of Calimete had a population of 29
column3: 736. With a total area of 958 km2 (370 sq mi)
column4: it has a population density of 31.0/km2 (80/sq mi).
